scripts.build: tsx scripts/auto-refactor.ts && npm --prefix cognition-core test && npm --prefix swarm-protocol test
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json && npm --prefix cognition-core run typecheck && npm --prefix swarm-protocol run typecheck
scripts.skills:sync: npm run skills:build && npm run skills:validate && npm run skills:test && npm run skills:plan && npm run skills:plan:validate && npm run skills:orchestrate && npm run skills:orchestrate:validate && npm run skills:control && npm run skills:control:validate
